A

AudioPlayer - Class in edu.rit.se.swen383.audio
The Player class implements a simple player for playback of an MPEG audio stream in a separate thread.
Based on the original player from the javazoom library by Mat McGowan.
AudioSource - Class in edu.rit.se.swen383.audio
AudioSource objects encapsulate an MP3 file and provide access to the file name as well as tag information found in MP3 files.
AudioSource(String) - Constructor for class edu.rit.se.swen383.audio.AudioSource
Create a new AudioSource object from the contents of the file named by the String argument.

equals(Object) - Method in class edu.rit.se.swen383.audio.AudioSource
